DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic Autoimmune Disease Other Classification Disease Diagnosis Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe another neurological autoimmune disorder classification.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system._A disorder resulting from loss of function or tissue destruction of an organ or multiple organs, arising from humoral or cellular immune responses of the individual to his own tissue constituents.  It may be systemic (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus), or organ specific, (e.g., thyroiditis). -- 2003_Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system.:A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.

A disorder resulting from loss of function or tissue destruction of an organ or multiple organs, arising from humoral or cellular immune responses of the individual to his own tissue constituents. It may be systemic (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus), or organ specific, (e.g., thyroiditis).
